methods.name: <init>

params.name: listingDiff
params.comment:
the ListingDiff to use to determine where there are differences that 
 need highlighting.

params.name: isListing1
params.comment:
true means that these are the highlights for the first listing.
 false means the highlights are for the second listing.

params.name: comparisonOptions
params.comment:
the tool options that indicate the current 
 background colors for the Listing code comparison panel.

methods.name: getOperandPairs
methods.comment: Gets an array of start/end positions for each operand within the operand field's full text.

params.name: text
params.comment: the full text from the operand field

params.name: codeUnit
params.comment: the code unit whose operand text is provided

return.comment:
the operand pairs indicating the start and end offsets for each individual operand
 within the text.

methods.name: isListing1
methods.comment: Determines if this highlight provider is for the first listing of the ListingDiff.

return.comment:
true if this provider's highlights are for the first listing. false if the
 highlights are for the second listing.
